author: atlantajewishtimes.com
title: Obituary: Evelyn Kirshstein
text: Evelyn Kirshstein, age 98, of Marietta died October 9, 2015. Survivors include her daughter and son-in-law, Nancy and Charles Levy, Marietta; daughter and son-in-law, Karen and Robert Schultz, Marietta; brother and sister-in-law, Ralph and Rhalda Kahn, Dunwoody; three grandchildren and five great-grandchildren. Sign online guest book at www.edressler.com . In lieu of flowers memorial donations may be made to a charity of your choice. A graveside service will be held Sunday, October 11, 2015 at 11:00 am at Arlington Memorial Park with Rabbi Joshua Heller officiating. Arrangements by Dresslerâ€™s Jewish Funeral Care, Atlanta (770) 451-4999
